description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help Sally safely skate through different levels in this simple, retro style game.   Kissing the pavement is not her favorite thing to do, but is what she will do the most, if you don't avoid the obstacles in her path.  Guide her through the park, a desert, and at night to complete her adventure.
